column4: Hey can anyone help me, i installed ubuntu 8.04 and now my mouse freezes up when i log on, i am new to linux
its a logitech g5, and it works when in the login screen
I currently use a G5 and it works perfectely.
is it your mouse or your X11 server. Maybe your system try to run compiz and can freeze because you acceleracted 3D may not work or something like that.
